org.jogamp.glg2d

Class GLG2DRenderingHints

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jogamp.glg2d.GLG2DRenderingHints

  • public class GLG2DRenderingHints
extends Object
    Rendering hints for the GLG2D library that customize the behavior.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static RenderingHints.Key KEY_CLEAR_TEXTURES_CACHE
      Specifies when to clear the texture cache.
      static Object VALUE_CLEAR_TEXTURES_CACHE_DEFAULT
      Use the default texture cache policy.
      static Object VALUE_CLEAR_TEXTURES_CACHE_EACH_PAINT
      Clear the texture cache before each paint.
      static Object VALUE_CLEAR_TEXTURES_CACHE_NEVER
      Never clear the texture cache.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GLG2DRenderingHints() 

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • VALUE_CLEAR_TEXTURES_CACHE_NEVER

        public static final Object VALUE_CLEAR_TEXTURES_CACHE_NEVER
        Never clear the texture cache.

      • VALUE_CLEAR_TEXTURES_CACHE_EACH_PAINT

        public static final Object VALUE_CLEAR_TEXTURES_CACHE_EACH_PAINT
        Clear the texture cache before each paint. This allows images to be cached within a paint cycle.

      • VALUE_CLEAR_TEXTURES_CACHE_DEFAULT

        public static final Object VALUE_CLEAR_TEXTURES_CACHE_DEFAULT
        Use the default texture cache policy.

      • KEY_CLEAR_TEXTURES_CACHE

        public static final RenderingHints.Key KEY_CLEAR_TEXTURES_CACHE
        Specifies when to clear the texture cache. Each image to be painted must be turned into a texture and then the texture is re-used whenever that image is seen. Values can be one of
        • VALUE_CLEAR_TEXTURES_CACHE_DEFAULT
        • VALUE_CLEAR_TEXTURES_CACHE_NEVER
        • VALUE_CLEAR_TEXTURES_CACHE_EACH_PAINT
        • any integer for the maximum size of the cache

      • GLG2DRenderingHints

        public GLG2DRenderingHints()
